title: Excellent location & wonderful amenities
text:
On my last tour leading assignment, I had the chance to stay two nights at Renaissance Paris Republique Hotel, which was only opened in 2016 in the vibrant Le Marais District (District 10) of Paris.
It is very new, and comes with contemporary design. And the room is very spacious, and there is the transparent glass panel for the bathroom, which will be a big bonus and delight for honeymoon couples.
I took the opportunity to enjoy a glass of Bordeaux wine on the first day of my check-in. And on the second night, I chose to eat at the hotel restaurant to try their food. I had lamb meat with parsnip. Wow, the parsnip was prepared in a creamy sauce, and I simply love the taste and the texture. Thumbs up to the Chef. Before my main course, I was also offered some swordfish puree and I liked the taste of it too.
The room is very nice, and my bed is very comfortable for the two nights there. At the hotel, there is a concierge and the staff is very knowledgeable and helpful.
There is a spa and also a fitness centre here, but I didn't get to use them. The metro station is within minutes of walking from the hotel. Just outside of the hotel, there are a number of restaurants ranging from French, Italian, Korean hotpot, as well as the fast food chain of MACDonalds, Burger King and KFC. It is a short drive from here into the city centre with the attractions of the iconic landmark of the Eiffel Towerï¼Œ Notre Dame Cathedral, Arc De Triomphe which was built by the order of Napoleon and many others.
I would really recommend all others to stay here.
